banner_paragraph: Twebwe ni twe ba mbere twazanye uburyo bwo gusiramura intama (Rabbit Artificial Insemination) mu Muryango w’Ibihugu bya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Kuva mu 2018, twayoboye mu bworozi bw’inziza, guteza imbere ubwoko, amahugurwa n'udushya.
veterinary_paragraph: Itsinda ryacu ry’inzobere ritanga ubufasha bw’ubuvuzi bw’amatungo kugira ngo inziza zibe mu buzima bwiza kandi zororoke neza hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga rigezweho.
hero_paragraph: Turatanga udushya mu bworozi burambye n’ubushakashatsi ku bwoko bw’inziza.
services_paragraph: Menya byinshi kuri twe no ku byo dukora
service1_description: Ni sosiyete ifite inshingano nke yanditswe mu Rwanda mu mategeko agenga amasosiyete (NO 17/2018 yo kuwa 13/04/2018).
service2_description: Yashinzwe mu 2018 nk’ikigo giteza imbere ubworozi burambye, amahugurwa no gutanga inama. Ubu yabaye IKIGO CY’UBWOKO BW’INZIZA.
service3_title: Intangiriro yacu mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba
service3_description: Twebwe turi sosiyete ya mbere yazanye uburyo bwa Rabbit Artificial Insemination mu Muryango w’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
training_paragraph: Menya ubumenyi n'ubushobozi bwa kinyamwuga mu bworozi bw'inziza
training_program_1_description: Menya ibanze ku bworozi bw’inziza, aho bazitira n'uburyo bwo kuzitaho.
training_program_2_title: Ubumenyi bwimbitse mu gutera no kororoka
training_program_2_description: Menya neza uburyo bwo kororoka, ubwoko bw’inziza n'imicungire y’ikororoka.
training_program_3_description: Amahugurwa arambuye ku buzima bw’inziza, indwara zikunze kubageraho no kuzirinda.
training_program_4_description: Menya uko wabyaza inyungu ubworozi bw’inziza.
visit_professional_description: Ku bashakashatsi n'abanyamwuga mu nzego zijyanye

1.name: Razzaq Mouhamed
1.text: Sinigeze nibwira ko korora inkwavu byaba inyungu gutya kugeza igihe nakoranye na Kigali Rabbit Center. Ubumenyi bwabo n’ubufasha baduha byahinduye ubucuruzi bwanjye.

2.name: Pauline
2.text: Kigali Rabbit Center yahinduye uburyo bwajye bwo korora. Bampaye inkwavu nziza n’inama z’abahanga byatumye nzamura ubucuruzi bwanjye.

3.name: Claudine
3.text: Urugendo rw’uburezi muri Kigali Rabbit Center rwari rwiza cyane! Abana banjye bigishijwe byinshi ku kwita ku matungo n’ubuhinzi burambye.

4.name: Samuel
4.text: Amahugurwa yabo yampaye icyizere cyo gutangiza ubuhinzi bwanjye bw’inkwavu. Byari bifatika kandi byoroheye abatangiye.

footer.description: ni kompanyi ifite uburenganzira buke bwanditswe mu Rwanda hakurikijwe amategeko (NO 17/2018 yo kuwa 13/04/2018).

services.sectionDescription: Serivisi zose kuva ku korora kugeza ku isoko, zitangwa n'inzobere mu bworozi.

breeding.title: Inama ku Kororoka
breeding.description: Inama z'abahanga ku buryo bwo kororoka, guhitamo inkomoko, no gutegura gahunda yo kororoka.

hutch.title: Igishushanyo cy'Ibikono
hutch.description: Igishushanyo cyihariye cy'ibikono kugira ngo bibone umwuka, bisukure, kandi byorohereze aborozi.

nutrition.title: Gahunda y'Ibiribwa
nutrition.description: Gahunda y’ibiribwa yateguwe hakurikijwe ubwoko n’icyiciro cy’izamuka ryazo.

health.title: Kubungabunga Ubuzima
health.description: Kwirinda indwara no gutegura uburyo bwo kwita ku buzima bw’inzobe zawe.

meta.title: Ibyerekeye Kigali Rabbit Center | Ubworozi bw'Inzobe Burambye mu Rwanda
meta.description: Menya Kigali Rabbit Center, intangarugero mu Rwanda mu gukoresha insimburangingo z'inzobe, ubworozi burambye n'amahugurwa yo korora inzobe.

hero.title: Menya Icyerekezo Cacu
hero.subtitle: Menya byinshi ku ntego zacu, ikipe yacu, n'uko duhindura ubworozi bw'inzobe muri Afurika.

ceo.name: Dieudonne Musoni
ceo.title: Umuyobozi wa Kigali Rabbit Center
ceo.subtitle: Inzobere mu Nzobe
ceo.intro: ni kompanyi yanditswe mu Rwanda hakurikijwe amategeko ya Companies Act (NO 17/2018 yo ku wa 13/04/2018).
ceo.mission: Yashinzwe mu 2018 nk’ikigo cy’ubworozi burambye, amahugurwa n’ubujyanama. Ubu yabaye
ceo.rest: muri EAC. Intego ni ugufasha aborozi gushyiraho imishinga irambye mu Rwanda no muri Afurika.

farming.title: UBWOROZI BW'INZOBE
farming.subtitle: Ubworozi Burambye kandi Bubyara Inyungu
farming.content1: Ubworozi bw'inzobe ni umurimo wunguka kandi urambye umaze gukundwa cyane. Kigali Rabbit Center yiyemeje guteza imbere no gushyigikira ubworozi bw’inzobe nk’amahirwe y’ubucuruzi mu Rwanda no muri Afurika.
farming.content2: Inzobe zirororoka cyane, zifata neza ibyo zirya kandi zishobora kubaho ahantu hatandukanye. Zikwiye cyane aborozi bato bashaka kongera umusaruro. Inyama z’inzobe ni nziza, zifite poroteyine nyinshi, n’isoko rinini ryo kuzicuruza.
farming.content3: Ikipe yacu itanga amahugurwa n’ubujyanama ku kororoka, kugaburira, kurwanya indwara no kwamamaza.
farming.highlight: Jyana natwe muri Kigali Rabbit Center, utangire urugendo rwo kugira ejo heza binyuze mu bworozi bw’inzobe.

why.title: Impamvu wahitamo Kigali Rabbit Center
why.content: Turi kompanyi ya mbere yatangije insimburangingo z’inzobe muri EAC. Guhera 2018, turi imbere mu bworozi burambye, genetics, amahugurwa n'ubushakashatsi.

vet.title: Ubuvuzi bw’Inzobe
vet.content: Itsinda ryacu ry’inzobere ritanga ubufasha bwa veteri n'ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu kwita ku buzima no kororoka kw’inzobe.

faq.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faq.subtitle: Soma hano umenye byinshi ku bworozi bw’inzobe.

items.question: Kuki ubworozi bw’inzobe?
items.answer: Inzobe zituruka ku nyamaswa zo mu gasozi z’i Burayi n’Amajyaruguru y’Afurika. Zikwiriye cyane mu bice by’icyaro no hafi y’imijyi. Zitanga inyama z’umweru zifite poroteyine nyinshi, cholesterol nkeya, kandi uruhu rwazo rukoreshwa mu myambaro n’ubugeni. Mu 2020, umusaruro w’isi w’inzobe wageraga kuri toni miliyoni 1.8 buri mwaka. Ibihugu bikomeye harimo Ubutaliyani, Ubufaransa, Ubushinwa.

items.question: Ibyiza byo korora inzobe:
answer: Igihe gito cyo gukura, zimenyera isoko mu byumweru 8
Inyama zifite intungamubiri nyinshi, resipe zirenga 300
Akarima gato no gukoresha amafaranga make

items.title: Ubuhanga bushya mu kororoka kw’inzobe
items.content: Twashyizeho uburyo bushya bwo kororoka bwongera amahirwe yo gutsinda ku kigero cya 40%. Iyandikishe mu mahugurwa yacu azakurikiraho.

items.title: Kwagura ubworozi byarangiye
items.content: Inyubako nshya igezweho imaze kuzura, yikuba kabiri ubushobozi bwo kororora no gukora ubushakashatsi.

items.title: Amahugurwa ku Nsimburangingo
items.content: Iyandikishe mu mahugurwa y’icyemezo ku nsimburangingo atangira ukwezi gutaha.

products.title: Ibicuruzwa by’Ubuhinzi bw’Inkwavu
products.subtitle: Ibintu byose ukeneye gutangiza cyangwa kwagura ubuhinzi bw’inkwavu.

pricing.title: Amahitamo yo Gusura
pricing.subtitle: Hitamo ubwoko bwo gusura buhuye n'ibyo ushaka

4.title: Gusura ya VIP
4.description: Gusura idasanzwe ifite uburenganzira bwo hejuru

receipt.title: Resi yo Gusaba Gusura
receipt.thank_you_note: Murakoze gusaba gusura. Itsinda ryacu rizakubwira muri saa 24 niba gusura biri ku buryo bukwiye no kwishyura niba bikenewe.

confirmation.title: Gusaba Byakiriwe!
confirmation.message: Murakoze gusaba gusura. Itsinda ryacu rizakubwira muri saa 24 niba gusura biri ku buryo bukwiye no kwishyura niba bikenewe.

errors.fetch_options: Kugena amahitamo yo gusura byanze. Nyamuneka gerageza mukanya.
errors.max_visitors: Abasura barenze urugero muri iyi ngingo ni {max}
errors.booking_error: Hari ikosa mu gihe wo kwiyandikisha

blog.title: Inkuru n'Ubumenyi ku Bworozi bwa Mpura
blog.subtitle: Shakisha ibice by'inkuru, amabwiriza, n'ibindi bikoresho byo kongera ubumenyi ku bworozi bwa mpura

1.title: Gutera intanga inkwavu, rumwe rupima 10 Kgs 🐰🐇
1.excerpt: Bishobora kumera bitangaje, ariko ari ukuri, kandi bikora hano muri Rwanda! Menya Dieudonné Musoni, umutunganyi w'ubucuruzi w'u Rwanda kandi CEO wa Kigali Rabbit Center.
content: Ubworozi bw'inkwavu bwave bukunda cyane muri Rwanda, buha abahinzi inyungu z'ibiryo n'ubucuruzi.
Uburyo bwa kera bwo kwororoka inkwavu busimburwa n'uburyo bushya bushoboka bushiraho ubuziranenge mugihe bukagira umusaruro mwinshi.
Uburyo bushya harimo imyubakire myiza, uburyo bwo kwororoka neza, n'uburyo bwo gutanga ibiryo neza.

2.title: Uburyo Bwo Komeza Kubaho ku Buhinzi Buto
2.excerpt: Menya uburyo bwo gukoresha uburyo budakomeretsa ibidukikije mu mirimo yawe y'ubuhinzi
content: Ubworozi bw'inkwavu bushingiye ku komeza kubaho bushishikariza uburyo budakomeretsa ibidukikije.
Uburyo nyamukuru harimo gukoresha neza imyanda, gukoresha ibikoresho bishobora kongera gukorerwa, n'uburyo bwo gutanga ibiryo bisanzwe.
Uburyo bwo komeza kubaho ntibyongera gusa ibidukikije ahubwo bukagira n'inkwavu mwiza.

confirmation.message: Murakoze kwiyandikisha kuri {program}. Itsinda ryacu rizakubwira muri saa 24 ukoresheje telefone cyangwa imeri kugirango rihamye kwiyandikisha kandi rikaguhaye amakuru yo kwishyura niba akenewe.
